registry.title: Maintain internal inventory of all known capabilities
Classify capabilities by status: nonexistent, partial, complete
Generate technical objectives from detected gaps
Prioritize objectives by future reuse potential
Distinguish technical error from conceptual limitation
Request human intervention only when required
Map impact of one capability over others
Evaluate risks before modifying critical capabilities
Distinguish local improvement from systemic improvement
Distinguish literal command from real objective
Request human validation for critical decisions
Evaluate cost of each executed action
Decide whether an action should be executed
Allocate portion of revenue to creator
